title: League Camera

embed.description: FAQ: skinspotlights.com/p/faq This is the current tool over 99% of new content use for their cinematic camera styles. Riot Games use this tool in their Champion Spotlights, Promotional Videos and even during live eSports Broadcasts. LoL Camera Hook DLL: LoL Camera Hook League Camera is a new camera tool developed solely by myself, its free to use and public for all to consume.

vi spiego in teoria serve soltanto a girare l'inquadratura come pare e piace nei replay per magari girarci dei video sopra, ma per evitare preferisco chiedere direttamente qua a voi
